About TalkSoon

Welcome to TalkSoon, your trusted partner for professional speech language pathology services in Southern Costa Rica. As a licensed Speech-Language Pathologist, I am dedicated to helping individuals of all ages overcome communication challenges and reach their full potential.

Our Mission

We believe that every person deserves the right to communicate effectively. Our mission is to provide personalized, evidence-based speech therapy services that empower our clients to express themselves confidently and connect meaningfully with the world around them.

Professional Expertise

With extensive training and experience in speech-language pathology, we specialize in:

  • Late talking and delayed speech development
  • Articulation and speech clarity issues
  • Language development and vocabulary building
  • Autism spectrum communication support
  • Stuttering and fluency disorders

Our Approach

Every client receives a comprehensive evaluation and a customized treatment plan tailored to their unique needs and goals. We use evidence-based practices combined with engaging, age-appropriate activities to make therapy both effective and enjoyable.

Located in the beautiful Southern Zone of Costa Rica, we serve families in the region with flexible scheduling options and a warm, welcoming environment where progress happens naturally.
